Language.text: Hi, young one, today is your Big Day---Grown-Up Day.
As a tradition of our kind, you must accept three Trials in order to show the world that you're worthy of the name.
So here begins your first trial--- Bravery Trial.
I will be waiting for you for your next trial.
You have incredibly completed the Bravery Test.
As a reward, you will be granted a new ability --- "Attack".
Specifically, now you can shoot spines upwards to kill enemies.
Well, now you can go on to your second trial --- Love Trial.
You have passed the first level of the Bravery Trial!
You have passed the second level of the Bravery Trial!
You have completed the Bravery Trial!
You have passed the first level of the Love Trial!
You have passed the second level of the Love Trial!
You have completed the Love Trial officially!
Unfortunately, you have failed the Trial. Please start over!
0 challenge chance will end the game.
Press E to use this button
Press Y Button to use this button
Sorry, your challenge chance is used up.
At the beginning, you are given 3 challenge chances.
Each time you challenge a level will cost you one challenge chance.
You can collect coins to gain challenge chances while challenging each level.
10 coins will be automatically transfered into 1 challenge chance.
Press Left or Right Arrow Key to move
Press Down Arrow Key to view further down
Use Right Sticker (down) to view further down
Press Up Arrow Key to view further up
Use Right Sticker (up) to view further up
